item.title: PARA
item.description: score:-24 Chances: Paramount Global has a strong portfolio of consumer brands including Paramount+, Pluto TV, CBS, Showtime Networks, Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon, MTV, Comedy Central and BET. The company is transitioning to the future with a name change to Paramount Global, representing its rich and legendary history in the entertainment industry.
